website_summaries.verdict: Affordability and quality in one package. This dry food is highly palatable and offers premium ingredients at an extremely reasonable price.
pros: We love that it comes from a small family-run company
The special fatty-acid blend is excellent for skin and coat health, plus this kibble contains a range of nutrient-rich fruits and veggies
cons: While it's listed as "suitable for all life stages," we wouldn't recommend it for growing puppies

website_summaries.verdict: Excellent everyday dog food for adults who just need nutrition and weight maintenance.
pros: Uses a variety of proteins and minerals to deliver multiple health benefits to the dog
Contains no artificial flavors or preservatives
Made in the U.S., so you can trust the ingredients
Reasonable price point per pound of food, even versus other dry food formulas
cons: Some dogs may be gassy with this formula

website_summaries.verdict: A value priced but still very high quality food that is loved by owners and their dogs alike, especially in households where dogs go through a lot of food.
pros: Family owned and operated company dog owners can feel good about supporting
Formula is especially good at promoting healthy skin and coat
Kibble is packed with nature-based nutrients from plants
cons: This food is best for adult dogs with no preexisting conditions or growth needs

customer_reviews.title: Why do they keep trying to overcharge for this item?
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. My dogs aternate Diamond Naturals flavors and do very well with it. No skin problems or such. That said, it looks like they are trying to screw Prime members again by embedding the delivery charge. The appropriate price for this item is $36.99. They are trying to recover the delivery cost by charging $49.98. Prime members shouldn't be paying for delivery on this item. Save yourself over $10 and stop by Tractor Supply on your way home. They charge $36.99. I've bought this item from Amazon dozens of times for $36.99 but will pass at the current price.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Once again, Amazon hikes the price.
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love it and I will continue to buy it.... from some one else. Just like so many premium brands on Amazon, they raise the price as soon as you buy it a few times. I can order this same brand from my local pet store without the $8. Hike in price. No problem.
customer_reviews.author: sisterfriend56

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what’s going on but I have had the lamb and rice on auto ship for a couple years, two bags a month. This month all three of my dogs became violently ill. I immediately got rid of the full 40 lb bag, got the dogs healthy after a week of stomach issues and started them on the second 40 lb bag. Same thing. My bullmastiff is so sick again! I hate to switch because It took us forever to find something that didn’t cause her allergies to flare, but something in the formula has changed or it’s knock-off dog food. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Heather J

customer_reviews.title: Weird developments...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my giant mixed breed German Shepherd. I really wanted to love it! Great packaging, got here fast, made in the US.... BUT After having Taco eat this consistently for several weeks, I am noticing his itching has gone haywire! His skin is dry and he’s started chewing on his paws. Not a normal behavior for him. Also, taco already drops horse sized piles of poop...but after starting this food I have to use two hands to pick up his poop! It’s like a bag of D size batteries that I could use to ward off muggers. Also it’s bright orange? Probably a recipe that just isn’t for my big guy 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this food
customer_reviews.text: Food came in the mail molded. It smelled terrrrrible and took me a few days to notice it was molded made my dogs sick
customer_reviews.author: Holley

customer_reviews.title: Natural and flavorful, but not for my Corgi
customer_reviews.text: To my knowledge, my Corgi, Lottie, was raised on this food. The ingredients and everything on it looked great, but it was a brand I did not fully trust because I had never seen it before. When a friend suggested she switch foods, I realized she really does prefer tiny kibbles for her little Corgi mouth. I think she prefers a chicken flavor as well. Every dog is different, so I don't believe it's a problem with the product, but it's not for her!
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: best dog food on the market
customer_reviews.text: This food used to be sold at our local farm market, and we raised our bullmastiff puppies on it. The ingredients are great, and the smell when you open the package smells like meat. Our dogs were vibrant and their coats were shiny on it. Recently my daughter adopted a dog from the pound who was skinny - I ordered this food and he immediately gobbled it down. It takes much less food to satisfy your dog because of the quality. Most of the food is digested, making their poop much less. I was excited to see Diamond Food again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Starkey

customer_reviews.title: What happened!?!?! $15 more per bag!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this dog food for years and it has been great. Now out of no where the price increases by $15?!?!?!?
customer_reviews.author: Realistic Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Newest bag making dog extremely sick for 5 days straight
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this dog food a while but the most recent bag had caused my dog to vomit after eating after every single meal for 5 days straight. I've noticed an increase in complaints with similar symptoms on other Web sites over the last few months. Not sure if they changed the formula, they've had another contamination problem or what, but I'm throwing my away the rest of this 40lbs bag (at least 35lbs still left) and purchasing another brand. Again in 5 days my dog has vomited after every single meal, and she's been on diamond for years.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Throwing up & lethargic
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!! I read hundred of reviews before purchasing this food for our 2 labs. Our younger lab who is in perfect health was throwing up each morning and sometimes after her meals. Once we switched her food (to one she has had before) she has been fine. Not lethargic or sad looking and not throwing up. I wouldn’t recommend the experience we had with this food to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: ASC

customer_reviews.title: Great success with our VERY itchy
customer_reviews.text: Great success with our VERY itchy, very sensitive, very neglected rescue dog. When we got him he was struggling w all types of skin irritations in large part due to food allergies. For the first few weeks he had fish oil twice a day and vitamin e rubbed into his cuts and peeling, chewed skin, in addition to starting this food right away and sticking w it. This food was recommended to me and we couldn't be happier w it: great price, fast delivery, great product. Both of our dogs are large breed older guys, and this food is excellent for them.
customer_reviews.author: teamellingson

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sensitive dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really love this food and it seems to not be irritating their allergies like many do. I have 2 Rhodesian ridgebacks that are very prone to yeasty ears, itchy skin and upset tummies. Red dye in cheap foods causes them allot of problems. This food is high enough quality that it doesn’t bother ther tummies, skin or ears but it doesn’t cost a fortune. Having two big dogs they go through allot of food. I’m happy to have found an affordable quality kibble that works for them.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Price increased about 60 percent in one month!
customer_reviews.text: I have to find a different food now. I have been buying this for my dogs for about a year from Amazon at $36.99 for the 40lb bag once a month. I come here this month to re-order and it has gone up to 49.98 for the same size bag. That's a $12.99 increase. No way will I accept this and continue to buy Diamond Natural. I will find a new company. Update: Price went back down but now my dogs a new food.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out - Dangerous for your dog!
customer_reviews.text: My dog had been eating this brand for 2 1/2 yrs. This bag made him seriously ill with severe diarrhea. His doggie Dr said stop feeding immediately & switch to Hills Science Diet for Sensitive Stomachs. After 2 days on the new feed his diarrhea stopped. Now a month later he is on a regular feeding schedule with Hills Science Diet formula for active dogs with lamb & rice. Everything is fine. I don't know what was wrong with the Diamond Natural food, but I reported the problem to the company & to the FDA & then threw it in the garbage in a sealed plastic bag!
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: Bag was destroyed and taped back together 🤨
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try this line of food after using Taste of the Wild for years. Delivered on time, but lots of loose pieces in the box. My bag of food had been sliced open, smooshed together, and then wrapped up in packing tape. Not too happy about that, and I see a few others have had the same experience. Will make it more difficult transitioning from TOTW to this brand, since my bag can’t even stand upright on its own. Disappointed but hopefully my pup likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. APGalaxy

customer_reviews.title: Price hike
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this brand with the lamb and rice recipe for a few years and it has been reasonably priced at about $36.00. I went to order today and there’s a pretty significant price hike up to $49.00! I’ll be looking for another option going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good start not so good now
customer_reviews.text: This food used to be a big win when she first started on a grain-free food. Now she'll barely touch it. In fact, she'll only eat if there's a topper on it or she's really hungry. I even thought it was just the flavor or main ingredient so I bought a different main to mix in. It didn't take long for her turn her nose up at that too. In order to get her to eat now we need to mix in a grain free from a different company. I hate to move away from this company but I can't make her eat something she doesn't like.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Leo loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 month old pitbull mix puppy loves this. We even use it as a training treat. We ordered the different protein flavors and switch them up for him which he seems to enjoy. His stools have been very regular and he is developing nice despite being the runt of his litter. I would recommend this product. I did consult with my Vet and she indicated that “grain free” is a fad with limited scientific basis to support its use. In fact, she indicated that recent evidence seemed to suggest grain free was causing nutritional deficiencies. We are very confident in using this product
customer_reviews.author: Amir Mohebbi, MD

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've had my young shepherd on this for a few months now he gets so much energy from it that's forsure lol! It Arrived on time as well! And my mom has had her springer spaniel on this diet its been the best there is, high quality too. He enjoys the taste and is always looking forward to breakfast and dinner. The 40 pound bag came today and holly molly! So much weight! I can tell this is going to last em awhile.(: It's just as much on the website as is in stores. I recommend you do whatever is best for you and your fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie macklin

customer_reviews.title: My old Boxer started acting like a puppy again!
customer_reviews.text: My dog started having food allergies and at that time we were feeding the Diamond Naturals Chicken and rice. He ate it for about 18 months then started getting hives after he ate. It took awhile to figure out but our vet was recommending more expensive options, suggesting we try Lamb or Salmon instead of chicken. Thats when I noticed that Diamond naturals had a lamb formula. Tried it, Dogs loved it and I loved watching my Dogs with more energy and shiny coats. Convenient shipping and great price. It is a win all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: A Landry

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the ingredients and the price. My dogs eat it but because that’s all they get. My dogs are grazers and it doesn’t seem like they eat as much food with this brand than Iams or Rachel Rays dog food. On the other hand, no bad reactions to the food and it keeps their allergies at bay since lamb is considered hypoallergenic. I would recommend for dogs with allergies!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Wilder

customer_reviews.title: CHECK THE SIZE.
customer_reviews.text: I feed this to my dog and buy the large size bags. I usually go to a local hardware store where it’s about $25 for the large bag. The other day I needed to buy an “add on” item so I scrambled to order something that’s about $25 to fulfill the requirements for the “add on item”. “Dog food”, I thought. I searched for her food and found a bag for about what I pay at the store down the street and hit “buy.” Swear to God a “fun size” bag just arrived at my house. Seriously it’s less than 5 lbs. for $25. WTF
customer_reviews.author: Melani Nicole

customer_reviews.title: With this dog food I was also given an entire very much unwanted village of ants!Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a bad word to say about this product, the ingredients, taste and price point are all good. My one problem with this particular bag is that it was delivered to my house with ants all over it. On the outside of the 40 pound bag as well as inside the bag it's ants, ants, and more ants. This is a problem for me and now I don't feel I can trust that it won't happen again..
customer_reviews.author: swall

customer_reviews.title: A big step up from most “Popular” dry dog food
customer_reviews.text: This is the least expensive on the list of 4 star dry dog food. I’ve been feeding this to my collection of seven mixed breed dogs without any sign of health problems. After experiencing the fatal result of the popular dry feeds, a little research on the internet led me to literally thousands of people that have lost their animals due to the popular feeds. This product is still not the human grade food I would want for my dogs, but it’s close enough.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Something has clearly changed...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what happened but the quality of this food has really deteriorated. I've been feeding this to my hound for almost four years and he's barely eaten or refused to eat the food from the latest bag. He's also had more gas than he's ever had. Very disappointed in the company and will not be purchasing again. Weve switched him to a different food and he's eating better and the gas problem is gone! Would not recommend this food to anyone and will be tossing the replacement bag we just ordered since they've suddenly stopped taking returns for it (I guess I'm not the only one who's switching their dog to something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great doggie food
customer_reviews.text: When we decided to purchase this dog food it was because of the ingredients in it. Good ingredients, such as the ones in Diamond Naturals lamb and rice formula, has kept my doggie healthy and doesn't make her gain weight. That's a huge plus! It digests well, and it doesn't have a strong dog food smell. It was a welcomed surprise to find out that the keebles are small, Not tiny, which is great for our 15 lb adult doggie. We've been buying in for months now, and will continue to do so. We definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good nutrition + Affordable = Diamond Naturals
customer_reviews.text: Have a doggo with a sensitive stomach is no fun and trying to find an affordable option that agrees with her stomach is even less fun, so when someone recommended this brand to me I was a little hesitant - but I am so glad I gave it a try! My sensitive dog has not had any reactions or upset stomach with this and my other dog who is super picky eats his whole bowl as soon as I fill it! It’s so refreshing to see good ingredients combined with affordability - thank you Diamond Naturals for making it easy to feed my dogs good food!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: This is all my dog ever ate
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves all of the diamond naturals. it is all he's ever got . I canged to diamond back in the 1990's when my dogs were having allergic reactions to the store bought P----a brand. The only complaint I had was the delivery guy put it directly in front of my door on a no skid mat. At 40 lbs I couldn't get my door open
customer_reviews.author: R. Skiba

customer_reviews.title: Gave my dog terrible gas
customer_reviews.text: This food gave my dog (but more so my roommates dog as she had the same food) terrible gas. Daily they just smelled terrible within minutes after eating, and my roommates dog suffered diarrhea quite often. Since then we have both switched our dogs to Canidae dry food and they are doing much better.
customer_reviews.author: Knoots

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dog food!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this food! I switched our two dogs from science diet to diamond naturals after doing some research and they absolutely love this food and their coats seem much healthier. As an added bonus I saved some money each month and got more food for my $$. I would highly recommend this food if you are unsure check dog food advisor for any questions you may have about what food is best for your pups.
customer_reviews.author: Pigg414

customer_reviews.title: My Great Dane loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried others but he would not eat them. The price is decent and it doesn't have bad ingredients. I wont switch his food up anymore since he loves this one so much! It also doesn't give him bad gas like some others I've bought.🤢 I have this on autoship so I don't have to break my back loading and unloading it! If you have a picky eater, try this! I hope they love it just as much as mine!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: The one our dogs prefer.
customer_reviews.text: I have greyhounds. So they need high protein. and I have one that gets constipated from chicken, so the lamb is a great choice for her. but she's also this picky dainty princess... and she LIKES the smaller pieces. my picky girl just prefers this flavor of this brand of dog food. so this is what we buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Something changed
customer_reviews.text: My dog is the least picky eater there is. She LOVES meal time. The first bag I got she didn't seem to have a problem with. When the second bag was delivered she turned her nose up at it. At first I thought she was sick, my dog never turns down food! A couple days later I gave her a bowl of the previous brand she used to eat. She inhaled it. The next day I tried diamond again, she wouldn't touch it. Eight years and she's never turned down food. If my dog won't eat it, I can't trust it. Switched back to her old diet and she's eating like normal again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Not for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: I am running out of Solid Gold Wolf King so decided to try switching him to a cheaper but still natural bag of food. The kibbles are way too small! this is meant for little dogs obviously. I would have to double the dose to get what he gets with his food now. 70lb lab. He eats it so flavor must be good and ingredients seemed ok, hasnt upset his stomach.
customer_reviews.author: jcrevs

customer_reviews.title: Helped tummy problems, but flavor is lacking
customer_reviews.text: So my pup was having some tummy issues with his old food and so we decided to switch. This has seemed to resolve the tummy issue thankfully, but I do need to add something extra to the food like cheese or meat for my dog to eat it and he isn’t normally very picky. But he really won’t touch the food unless we add something with more flavor to it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Wilder

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: We had our dog on a grain free diet for a long time... And she is somewhat sensitive to beef, chicken and other meats... She just gets very bad gas! Due to the transition from her past dog food, which she was on for 2 years, to this one she has had some gas but loves the food and I am hopeful that this will be a beneficial transition for her in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Puking, diarrhea and constant flatulence! No bueno!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this dog food for three months now and it just keeps getting worse and worse. Theast batch made two of my dogs throw up every time they ate it and it gave my elder dog horrible diary... And don't even get me started on the constant farts coming from both of my dogs. This dog food it terrible and I won't be purchasing it again no matter how convenient it is.
customer_reviews.author: ashleytown

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog = happy dog mom
customer_reviews.text: My dog has severe food allergies so I have limited choices when it comes to what I feed him. This is one of the few that had the best quality of ingredients and he loves it. He had absolutely no stomach upset when I switched him over, cold turkey. It’s a great price for the amount you get an aid comes in a very sturdy bag so there’s no chance of it ripping during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Lamb flavor is better than the chicken!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding our rescue (golden, collie and chow) diamonds for over 2 years. He gradually stopped eating the chicken flavor so we would have to add chicken stock or something to it to get him to eat it. Rather than choosing a different brand I decided to try a the lamb flavor. Well this week he ate each feeding right away and seemed to enjoy it very much. So far so good! I'm just glad I decided to choose a different flavor - diamonds does have the best ingredients for the price and I can stay happy that he's getting the nutrition he needs.
customer_reviews.author: C Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Steep price increase
customer_reviews.text: Time for a new dog food. Had this on subscription as it was a quality food at a fair price. Now they've jacked up the price substantially to where other, top brands are competitive or even cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: High quality, affordable, dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it. It is a high quality product at a great price. Fast delivery. Amazon used to have a different delivery service deliver this dog food, and it would arrive with the bag ripped open, and dog food everywhere. What a waste! Since Amazon now uses their own shipping company to ship the dog food, it always arrives in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Takakura (Ken-San)

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for quality
customer_reviews.text: I will start by saying that I know this isn't the top of the line dog food, but comparing it to other dry dog foods I've made the conclusion that this is the best value I can find. -My dog enjoys the food -Big bulk size and I only have to order every couple of months. -Ingredients seem to be better compared to other big store brands with similar pricing
customer_reviews.author: Kipp

customer_reviews.title: my dogs love the lamb.
customer_reviews.text: I have had two large bags of dog food down one is the diamond lamb and the other one is another major brand supposed to be very healthy dog food and between the two my dogs will eat the diamond until it's gone before they get into the other one. I couldn't believe how much more they like this one. Nothing wrong with the uplink
customer_reviews.author: Delinda

customer_reviews.title: Significant price increase
customer_reviews.text: I've been on a subscription to the 40 pound bag for about a year now for 36 dollars a month, and this month it went up by over 10 dollars for the same amount. Sadly going to have to cancel this one and get a different kind :(
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great pricing! I've been purchasing Diamond Naturals Lamb & ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pricing! I've been purchasing Diamond Naturals Lamb & Rice Dry Food for my retrievers for several years. They love the food and have never had an issue with weight, coat or allergies while on it. I love the convenience of delivery to my door every 2 weeks. The pricing is ten dollars less per bag than I can find locally.
customer_reviews.author: TJP

customer_reviews.title: Make sure its right for your pet
customer_reviews.text: I wrote earlier believing my dog died from this food. It's more likely she died from a genetic condition Doberman's are prone to have. She did seem to have a sensitive stomach so not all the food we gave her set well. My other dogs kind of liked this food but preferred the former food best. It is best to have a good understanding of the breed of dog you have and know what is best for their diet before giving them any food.
customer_reviews.author: The Nidy22

customer_reviews.title: Check local prices but not bad
customer_reviews.text: One of our four dogs is extremely picky and this seems to be the only food he eats consistently. We did a raw diet for a while until the picky dog quit eating it. So now we feed this. The price is about $6 more than it can be purchased elsewhere but was very convenient to have shipped to a vacation address rather than travelling with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E.

customer_reviews.title: Check for mold
customer_reviews.text: My blue heeler likes this food and it seems to be top quality but the bottom 1/3 of this last 40lb bag was a moldy mess.I have not had this problem previously but I now wonder how old this food is.How is it stored and how can I know that this won't happen again? For this reason I have to give this product a less than stellar review.
customer_reviews.author: BR Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My dog, Sonny, loves Diamond Naturals so much and apparently one of our neighbor does, too, because the last dog food bag was just stolen outside our door! I'm shocked. It must be really popular among all the dogs. Even my nephew's dog eats it and he is really picky. Since, he's been eating Diamond Naturals (Lamb) he's had no skin allergies and no stomach issues (stool is hard). My dog's skin condition has cleared up as well. Happiness across the board, except for the stolen dog food! Just reordered again and made sure the dog food will be held, not left at front door. I do love the convenience of dog food being delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Rose

customer_reviews.title: raised my dogs PH levels
customer_reviews.text: He gobbled it up.. but was looking for a urine friendly dog food, this is not it. It raised my English Lab PH levels to a high number. I have now moved back to Purina Lamb & Rice and his levels are back to normal. The breeder recommended Purina and I should of listened. Apparently the last 4 Labrador winners at Westminster are on Purina!
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and price.  My dogs love it and it has a high rating!
customer_reviews.text: Highly-rated food and at a good price. I have a houseful of "foster failures' and this really helps stretch my budget. I checked several rating-systems for dog foods and this gets 4 1/2 stars out of five...the reasons for not five being rather minor objections and not affecting the healthiness of the food. My pups love it and are thriving...their teeth are in great shape thanks to feeding the dry food. Gets seven "arfs" around here.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Husky with tummy issues
customer_reviews.text: When we got our husky, she had quite an issue with diarrhea. We talked to her vet and the guy at the pet store. It was recommended that we get her totally off fowl. So we changed her to lamb puppy food, and it worked great, so we recently switched her to the adult version, it has been a good switch.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Wall

customer_reviews.title: Our husky loves this
customer_reviews.text: We have no problems with the dogs wanting to eat this. It helped put weight onto two large rescue dogs a very skinny Husky and German Shepherd. Young husky was skinny and sick when adopted, he has filled out and has lots of energy. This is good food for large and energetic dogs. It's better than dog food from store and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Cadgene

customer_reviews.title: Changed formulation?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this dog food for years. The last bag I got, the dogs won't eat it... I figured it was a bad bag, so I opened another one of the same and they won't eat it either - not sure if they've changed the formulation but looks like I will have to find a new brand!
customer_reviews.author: NY MOM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. I have a small dog with stomach issues and this food is one that wont make him sick. He prefers the other brand that I mix with this brand, but the ingredients in the diamond naturals is better for him. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jayden

customer_reviews.title: My dog seems to like it
customer_reviews.text: In light of the grain-free stuff going on and heart disease in dogs, I looked for an alternative to start mixing in with what I already had for my pup. She seems to really like this one, and it did not give her any tummy distress during the changing over process. It's a little on the pricey side, but the ingredients quality is what got me. It does make a gravy with water added.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its all I have been feeding him for over a year.
customer_reviews.text: I have an 80 pound bulldog that seems to get itchy skin from wheat products. I feed him this Lamb version of Diamond Naturals and he does well on it. with free shipping the price is competitive with what I pay at the feed store so I may start ordering it in rather than driving into town. People always comment on how beautiful he is. When he is clean his coat is shiny and a reddish brown. He seems happy to eat it. I could maybe cut him back on portions because he has gained weight.I like him at 80 pounds and the vet has not said anything. It makes him more cuddly.
customer_reviews.author: BoneHead

customer_reviews.title: Only get if you like soft mushy stools!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 dogs had super soft stools eating this food. Their poop was massive in size and just big piles of mush! Each dog pooped about 5 times each per day. Finished off the back and will never buy again. Back to good old Purina Dog Chow for me!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Made my dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: Tried to changeover my 4 dogs from Eukanuba Lamb & Rice to this product. I was doing a gradual changeover mixing it with their current food so as not to upset their stomach and let them get used to the new food in time. After the second feeding 2 of my dogs started throwing up and now have liquidly stools. Another dog had an allergic reaction and another has severe gas. Needless to say I discontinued feeding. 3 out of the 4 are rebounding and my GSD still has diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value but made my Doggies very sick
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 3 dogs after I learned of the FDA chart that had all the linked dog food brands that had been reported with the risk for cardiac issues (DCM). We went from RR's Noutrish to this Brand's lamb and rice flavor. I am not sure if it is because we are trying lamb for the first time, but this has made 2/3 of my dogs absolutely ill. Vomiting and diarrhea for both of them since we started mixing this with their old food. If your pet has a sensitive stomach, I would say this isn't the brand for them.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Warren

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended at our local feed store in our new town-we have dogs ranging from 10 months to 14 years old and they all do great on it....great stools, no digestive issues and they love the taste. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: kat mooney

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a very sensitive stomach and is picky, loves this food, however 😊 after starting to feed it, my dog had a noticeable increase in muscle mass and a softer coat, this food seems to be of great quality. I use subscribe and save so the cost is no more than generic proplan but it's higher quality for sure, definately will be getting again!
customer_reviews.author: Her515

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great kibble for my Pomeranian! He needs small pieces of kibble & it's was tricky to find healthy food but also bite sized. Luckily I found diamond brand & he loves it! The kibble is tiny enough for him to eat & has no digestive problems at all. I recommended trying this for your dog of all sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Used Diamond as a puppy with great success and she loves this
customer_reviews.text: Used Diamond as a puppy with great success and she loves this. Nutrition is excellent, vet loves her weight, and she has easily removed dumps. We are good all around. Added 2-18 Just had our girl at the Vet for an annual checkup and the vet was all compliments and smiles. She said her weight was spot on and her coat was one of the nicest she has seen. diamond is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: CiskO

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with delivery !!!
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered on a rainy day left In a cardboard box for the day and by the time we got home it was all wet . Not sure if it is even okay to use now
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Dog simply doesn’t like it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog isn’t a finicky eater at all and normally inhales her food within a few minutes. She hates this food and refuses to eat it. She’ll reluctantly eat a few pieces, but avoids it like the plague. I’m sure it’s good food, I just wish I could get my money back and not waste the food.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Kibble size isn't consistent
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd bag of Diamond Naturals, the first beef flavor one was in coin shape, second chicken flavor big breed one was in short round cylinder shape. This one, it's cat food kibble size. I wish the manufacture can keep it more consistent. Ingredients and price are all great though, flavor can be more appealing. Over all trust worthy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not order again.
customer_reviews.text: Locked in to a set price . After the 3re delivery the price went up without my knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: Thor Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Quality lamb for sensitive pup stomach
customer_reviews.text: I feel a little silly rating the quality and flavor of this dog food— but I will say that by collie mix has a sensitive stomach, and the lamb formula has been great on his digestive track and he always eats every portion. So, it feels like things are going well! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: We have been using diamond naturals for a year without issues but I think there is something wrong with the bag of lamb we just purchased. Our pup has been sick with diarrhea and we just started this bag Saturday. I did some digging and this past month a lot of dogs are sick on diamond naturals; apparently a few have died as well from kidney failure. We're throwing it out and buying a different brand. I only gave a two because it was fine before.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients are misleading
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The ingredients listed in the pictures do not show that this has peas in it. In the description it shows 2 different ingredient sections in which one says it has peas and the other does not. Upon receiving this item I read the ingredients and it says it has peas in it. Very very misleading and concerning for me since peas may be linked to that heart problem in dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed
customer_reviews.text: Something is off with this dog food now. My 6-year old Labrador used to eat this just fine, until recently. Now, he vomits almost immediately after eating. Pay attention to the recent reviews on this product...the formula must have changed, because now dogs are getting sick from it.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I bought this one
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Diamond dry cat food for years and have been very satisfied with it. Because of that experience I decided to give this one a try for my 5 dogs. I'm sorry I did. The food smelled like skunk, none of our dogs liked it - and we didn't like the foul smelling gas emitting from our pets because of it. Threw this stuff in the trash and have gone back to the old food - no more of this stuff for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs cannot wait to dig in now!
customer_reviews.text: We went to more natural kibble several months ago, purchasing Abound at Kroger. Got a little expensive with two large dogs. Saw this Diamond Naturals and giving it a try though I have to tell you all; after two days the dogs cannot wait to dig in! I have mixed now with the Abound for an easier transition in their systems...this being smaller kibble one actually workers around with just front teeth to the Diamond! Price and profile are right on and dogs love it; thank you for offering this Amazon and to Diamond Naturals for making this good product!
customer_reviews.author: jim odellTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: So we’ve been using this food for quite a long while now. Our dog is extremely sensitive - his skin/fur, digestive system, emotions...everything! This food turned out to be fantastic for him! We initially purchased it locally, but started buying it through Amazon because it was so much more convenient! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: arroyo0516

customer_reviews.title: Quality & tasty
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs(lab,pit bull ) live this food, and I love the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: jrsygal59

customer_reviews.title: My two pit mixes love this food
customer_reviews.text: My two pit mixes love this food. One has an allergy and can only eat the lamb. No gas from either of them, which was great, because pits are know for that. When the price jumped in January, I found it locally for $40 a bag. It a small pet food store in my neighborhood. I decided I had enough of the price changes here on Amazon, and now just purchase it from the locally owned store, who knows the people at Diamond Natural. Even though the price is down again, and I got an email about it, I am going to continue to get it locally.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Kramer

customer_reviews.title: It has great ingredients and none of the dogs have shown any ...
customer_reviews.text: I feed all 4 dogs this brand and flavor. It has great ingredients and none of the dogs have shown any negative side effects we've experienced with other brands; puking, shedding, dandruff, more constant bowel movements, food allergies, itching, etc. We have a doberman, boston terrier, german shorthair pointer, and now a american pitbull terrier. For the PRICE, quality, and the 40lb bag its a win!!
customer_reviews.author: sierra

customer_reviews.title: My dog adapted to it and liked it; so I got a second bag
customer_reviews.text: My dog adapted to it and liked it ;so I got a second bag. However the end of the bag was a very different color and texture than the rest (see picture). I had to throw it away :-( Not sure I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Better nutrition for your dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my dog has food allergies; however, this bag lasted a month (and I have 2 pits, a big lab and a little terrier)... So, I'm not sure if it's because the food is better, so they don't have to eat as much??? Or they don't really like the flavor of the food.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn portera

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for price, quality, and convenience
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review on behalf of my dog. She cannot articulate her thoughts quite as well on the computer due to her lack of opposable thumbs. We have a self-feeder, she loves this food. Too much. We've been using this food for three months, and she still will eat more than she needs to. We just exercise her more to keep the weight off (I know many people are against self-feeders, but it often depends on breed of dog, training, and life-style of owner). I'm a fan of three things: no unnatural ingredients, the price, and the speed of delivery to my door!
customer_reviews.author: A Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Itch free dog
customer_reviews.text: Was it the food? Sifu, our Shiba Inu is no longer scratching madly at night. We won't be making any other changes to his food for now. He seems happy and his skin does too.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Cruzado

customer_reviews.title: #1 dog food!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve done so much research on dog food. I have 3 big dogs and buy a 30lbs bag a week which can get expensive this brand is great! Grain free, reasonably priced and I’m not feeding my dogs anything unhealthy!! Love this food, so do my dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Landis f

customer_reviews.title: My dog love this product
customer_reviews.text: My dog love this product, Before my dog eat this she den't not drink much water. Now her coat is so beautiful , no dog breath, she has more energy. this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients and a good price
customer_reviews.text: I think I like this more than my dog but she's picky. I really wish she liked it more. She'll still eat it but we switched to Costco brand. I'll still order this if I'm being lazy as I do like the company and ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: My dog disliked
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the very few foods my 14 year old dog has disliked. He would not touch his food bowl. He looked at me like I should know better. If your dog is a foodie...yiu may want to think twice
customer_reviews.author: bella12

customer_reviews.title: This food did not sit well with either of my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd give this food a try because of the great reviews. Ever since I started them on it, both my dogs have had terrible gas and now they are intermittently throwing up. I guess I'll go back to the expensive stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Switching from a bargain brand like Purina to this has made such a difference in ...
customer_reviews.text: Switching from a bargain brand like Purina to this has made such a difference in the body fat and muscle tone of my Schnauzer in just 1 month! His waist is snatched and tight, his hair is thick and healthy, and he has rippling muscles showing through in the front. He also has smaller, firmer stools and doesn't seem to eat nearly as much to stay full. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this dog food
customer_reviews.text: I love this dog food my dogs been on it for 4 years I recently started ordering it on amazon and the bag was already damaged but thankfully I needed it ASAP so I didn’t care if it was open already but I don’t like leaving the bags open for long time. Hopefully the next one isn’t open
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Street Dogs dig it...
customer_reviews.text: My street dog....an adorable type of mostly terrier with chow / shepherd mix, 45 lbs, mostly black and orange with shaggy feet and a long blond tuft of hair b/t his ears...loves it. And he's not bashful about growling when he's not happy. A neighbor gave me left over "gravy train" after his dog passed. I put in bowl while I waited for the next delivery of this stuff. It sat and sat. First he took a few kibble in his doggy mouth....but then spat them out and walked away. His coat is full and his wiry hair is soft with a nice sheen. He's very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Wysteria

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate
customer_reviews.text: Our Scottish terrier hated this unfortunately. He’s normally a great eater but actually showed an aversion to it and would go hungry over eating this brand.
customer_reviews.author: DSprks

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping practices...
customer_reviews.text: Opened my bag 1 week ago and began feeding it to my Rhodesain Ridgeback...He wouldn't touch it...Ok maybe he doesnt want to eat...Next day he wouldnt eat it...So I tastedit, like I sometimes do to make sure it will taste the right way....Spit it out immediatly...Further examination there were holes in the bottom of the bag..Poor quality control....Very obvious holes..Money down the tubes...
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Dean

customer_reviews.title: Well I ordered the food, because I had foot ...
customer_reviews.text: Well I ordered the food, because I had foot surgery and it is easier for me to order things online. Problem is that when I opened the package, the food looked very dark brown almost black compared to my current food same brand that I picked up locally. I was leery to feed it to my dog, maybe the food was old or got wet or I don't really know.
customer_reviews.author: Loved2pieces

customer_reviews.title: Never received the package
customer_reviews.text: I favor 'Taste of the Wild' but my budget requires me to step over to this good product. At 80 on a fixed income and three GDS to feed...well, cost more to feed my 'honeys' than I spend on myself. KDG, Esq
customer_reviews.author: Keith Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Bag Arrived Open
customer_reviews.text: I feel like it's a good product but any savings I receive buying via Amazon is offset by the damaged packaging and stale product I received
customer_reviews.author: Glenn B

customer_reviews.title: Great price for good dog food. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I went to a local pet store here in town and the guy who worked there told me about this food- he raved about the quality of the ingredients and the price. He thought it is better than the "expensive" brands. I was pleased to find it on Amazon for cheaper and delivered right to my doorstep for free. I have two little dogs, so one bag of this food lasts me quite a while. I did alot of research on dog food trying to find something with no corn. I have been really happy with this product and my dogs seem to like it as well. I think it's a great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: GrahamTakesTheHoneycomb

customer_reviews.title: Great compromise
customer_reviews.text: My dogs seem to like the food. Of course, my dogs will eat almost anything. However, Diamond Naturals is a 'happy medium" between quality and price, i.e. it is much better quality than most leading dog food brands, while still being priced reasonably enough to be affordable to the average working-class family.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: The others loved it like the other flavors
customer_reviews.text: Only brand I buy for my dogs and cat but for some reason my big dog had allergies with it (lamb). The others loved it like the other flavors. I have stayed with beef and chicken with no problems. They have way less bowel movements with this brand. Cons: The price constantly fluctuates to prices that are ridiculous. I typically spend 36-38 for a 40lb bag. Today it is at 73!! Good way to start losing my business!
customer_reviews.author: Leo81

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand, dog did not like this flavor
customer_reviews.text: My dog normally loves this brand, not sure if it was just this flavor or what, but man oh man it messed uo his tummy something fierce. I stand by this brand however. Just not this flavor
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Rose Comer

customer_reviews.title: This food actually made it worse. I have found that only grain free works ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have a dog with allergies. He's a boxer mix and allergies are quite common in that breed. So I was looking for a solution as in my previous experience the right food made all the difference. This food actually made it worse. I have found that only grain free works in my dog's situation. I'd imagine that if your dog doesn't have any similar issues, this food would be okay. Although, research suggests that in all meat eating creatures, a grain based diet can cause inflammation resulting in autoimmune responses.
customer_reviews.author: Señor Kornnut

product_meta.title: Diamond Naturals Premium Formulas Dry Dog Food for Adult Dogs Made with Real Meat Protein, Superfoods, Probiotics and Antioxidants for Supporting Overall Health in Dogs
product_meta.description:
Size:40 lb

Made with ingredients of exceptional quality, Diamond Naturals provides complete, holistic nutrition for every pet. Each Diamond Naturals dry formula is enhanced with superfoods and guaranteed probiotics, for optimal nutrition and digestive support. Lamb protein and moderate levels of fat help support ideal body condition while providing the nutrients your dog needs to stay active day after day. Guaranteed levels of selenium and vitamin E ensure that your dog receives optimum antioxidant nutrition, while omega-6 and omega-3 fatty acids from superfoods help maintain healthy skin and a shiny coat.

Ingredients

Lamb meal, ground white rice, cracked pearled barley, peas, egg product, rice bran, dried yeast, chicken fat (preserved with mixed tocopherols), millet, dried beet pulp, flaxseed, natural flavor, potassium chloride, salt, DL-methionine, choline chloride, taurine, dried chicory root, kale, chia seed, pumpkin, blueberries, oranges, quinoa, dried kelp, coconut, spinach, carrots, papaya, yucca schidigera extract, dried Lactobacillus plantarum fermentation product, dried Bacillus subtilis fermentation product, dried Lactobacillus acidophilus fermentation product, dried Enterococcus faecium fermentation product, dried Bifidobacterium animalis fermentation product, vitamin E supplement, beta carotene, iron proteinate, zinc proteinate, copper proteinate, ferrous sulfate, zinc sulfate, copper sulfate, potassium iodide, thiamine mononitrate (vitamin B1), manganese proteinate, manganous oxide, ascorbic acid, vitamin A supplement, biotin, niacin, calcium pantothenate, manganese sulfate, sodium selenite, pyridoxine hydrochloride (vitamin B6), vitamin B12 supplement, riboflavin (vitamin B2), vitamin D supplement, folic acid.

Contains a source of live (viable), naturally occurring microorganisms.

Guaranteed Analysis

Crude Protein 23.0% Minimum
Crude Fat 14.0% Minimum
Crude Fiber 4.5% Maximum
Moisture 10.0% Maximum
Zinc 150 mg/kg Minimum
Selenium 0.35 mg/kg Minimum
Vitamin A 15,000 IU/kg Minimum
Vitamin E 150 IU/kg Minimum
Taurine* 0.12% Minimum
Omega-6 Fatty Acids* 2.2% Minimum
Omega-3 Fatty Acids* 0.4% Minimum
Total Microorganisms* Not Less Than 80,000,000 CFU/lb
(Lactobacillus plantarum, Bacillus subtilis, Lactobacillus acidophilus, Enterococcus faecium, Bifidobacterium animalis)

Calorie Content

3,550 kcal/kg (332 kcal/cup) Calculated Metabolizable Energy
feature_bullets: HIGH quality PROTEIN made with real PASTURE RAISED lamb, tailored for adult dogs to thrive; optimal amino acid profile for LEAN, STRONG MUSCLES
Premium ingredients with added vitamins & minerals; fruits and vegetables as SUPERFOODS for hard-working ANTIOXIDANTS; fatty acid blend for SKIN & COAT
Nutrient rich and HIGHLY DIGESTIBLE with PROPRIETARY PROBIOTICS that survive and thrive in the GI tract; at guaranteed levels
FAMILY OWNED & run, MADE in the USA choosing ingredients from TRUSTED, SUSTAINABLE sources around the world; Call with questions 800 442 0402
NO corn, wheat, filler; NO ARTIFICIAL flavors, colors, or preservatives added; Made with scientifically advanced food safety protocols

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
